extendedInfo.description: If you are Imagine Dragons's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Imagine Dragons's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Imagine Dragons's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Imagine Dragons's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Imagine Dragons (EP)- Hell And Silence (EP)- It's Time (EP)- Continued Silence (EP)- Night Visions-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - All Eyes- America- Amsterdam- Bleeding Out- Cha-Ching (Till We Grow Older)- Cover Up- Curse- Demons- Drive- Every Night- Fallen- Hear Me- I Need A Minute- It's Time- Leave Me- Look How Far We've Come- Lost Cause- My Fault- Nothing Left To Say- On Top Of The World- Pantomime- Radioactive- Rocks- Round And Round- Selene- The River- Tiptoe- Tokyo- Underdog- Uptight- Working Man

reviews.title: ADDS
reviews.comment: Omg I HATE THE ADDS! Cut them OUT!!
reviews.author: Kyla Cymone
